facts.death_sentence_commuted: Transportation for life by Provincial Government

legal_issues.self_defence_plea: Not raised during trial or preceding inquiry

confession.validity: Retracted confession doubted due to procedural defects
confession.content: Sultan Muhammad claimed he fired at Khuban in self-defence

dying_declaration.content: Khuban stated Sultan Muhammad fired at him while running away
dying_declaration.supporting_evidence: No signs of close-range firing, blood location inconsistent with self-defence claim

key_findings.act_of_trespass: Sultan Muhammad entered Khuban's house to commit adultery with Mst. Sabarjan
key_findings.sequence_of_events: Khuban returned unexpectedly, confrontation ensued, Sultan Muhammad fired while fleeing
key_findings.self_defence_claim: Rejected due to lack of necessity and inconsistencies in evidence

judgment.reasoning: No justification for firing; evidence supports intentional killing
